title: Ticket #253: Improve ckpt lib's printf-workalike
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

This change includes some substantial changes to the _condor_vfprintf_va function. Highlights include some new format / size specifiers (which are used from several places in Dan's overall patch set) and an overall simplification of the code. Dan also said that he has additional changes that he did not provide me with at the time we met that add things like ability to specify field width and precision.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (5).
